About.Name: Anthony Mao
About.AboutText:
Hi, I am Anthony Mao. I am a computer science student pursuing my undergraduate degree at Seattle Pacific University. I am dedicated to expanding my knowledge and skills in computer science.

I thrive in collaborative environments where I can contribute my expertise and learn from my peers.

Experience.ExperienceText: Over the summer of 2025, I did an intenrship at Prestige Stem Academy. Prestige Stem Academy is a private educational institution that offers small group and 1-on-1 instruction in Honors, AP, and IB courses. It provides online and in-person classes, summer camps, and college counseling. Additionally, it specializes in academic enrichment for middle and high school students. Students from Prestige often enroll at top-ranking universities. My internship Role & Responsibilities (IT Support): Set up classroom tech (TV, computers, printers, quiz buzzers), scanned and digitized class documents, managed student attendance and performance via registration system, and supported Canvas and school account setup under IT supervision.

Project1.Title: TrayMate Senior Software Engineering Project
Project1.Desc: Me and a team of classmates create an app called Traymate, which is a smart, AI powered meal management system that automates meal suggestions for care facilities and provides a simple meal-ordering interface for their residents, particularly those with special need diets.
